calculateRequestPrice(uint32,uint32).details: This function relies on the transaction gas price which is not automatically set duringsimulation. To estimate the price at a specific gas price, use the estimatePrice function.

params._callbackGasLimit: is the gas limit used to estimate the price.
params._numWords: is the number of words to request.

calculateRequestPriceNative(uint32,uint3.details: This function relies on the transaction gas price which is not automatically set duringsimulation. To estimate the price at a specific gas price, use the estimatePrice function.

params._callbackGasLimit: is the gas limit used to estimate the price.
params._numWords: is the number of words to request.

estimateRequestPrice(uint32,uint32,uint2.details: This is a convenience function that can be called in simulation to better understandpricing.

params._callbackGasLimit: is the gas limit used to estimate the price.
params._numWords: is the number of words to request.
params._requestGasPriceWei: is the gas price in wei used for the estimation.

estimateRequestPriceNative(uint32,uint32.details: This is a convenience function that can be called in simulation to better understandpricing.

params._callbackGasLimit: is the gas limit used to estimate the price.
params._numWords: is the number of words to request.
params._requestGasPriceWei: is the gas price in wei used for the estimation.

returns._0: the request ID of the most recent VRF V2 request made by this wrapper. This should only be relied option within the same transaction that the request was made.

params._callbackGasLimit: is the gas limit for the request.
params._numWords: is the number of words to request.
params._requestConfirmations: number of request confirmations to wait before serving a request.

calculateRequestPrice(uint32,uint32).notice: Calculates the price of a VRF request with the given callbackGasLimit at the currentblock.

calculateRequestPriceNative(uint32,uint3.notice: Calculates the price of a VRF request in native with the given callbackGasLimit at the currentblock.

estimateRequestPrice(uint32,uint32,uint2.notice: Estimates the price of a VRF request with a specific gas limit and gas price.

estimateRequestPriceNative(uint32,uint32.notice: Estimates the price of a VRF request in native with a specific gas limit and gas price.

requestRandomWordsInNative(uint32,uint16.notice: Requests randomness from the VRF V2 wrapper, paying in native token.
